name: Pets World
description:
Pick & Switch between your cute pets !  and help them save their friends using their abilities !

Made for GDevelop game jam #2

Built under 10 days using the game engine GDevelop !

for the theme: Pets and/or Companions

I hope you enjoy and feel the love vibes in the game <3

You can also play the game on liluo.io !

Credits:
